item.description: FATALITY Physical Rescue; INC#1644; 12:30AM; 5006 N Odessa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ro1GrD; Encino; Sadly, one person perished due to a tree falling into the two-story home. LAFD firefighters, heavy rescue, and urban search and rescue teams will continue working together to remove the tree. LAPD, Coroner, and Mayor's Crisis Response Team responding. PIO Captain Cody Weireter en route.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC14 E109 E288 E289 E83 E88 E89 EM17 HE1 HR3 PI3 RA100 RA83 RA88 RA889 RA90 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1644; 11:14PM; 5006 N Odessa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ro1GrD; Encino; A large tree fell onto a two-story house with four occupants inside. Three safely evacuated, but one remains trapped. Extended rescue operation underway.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E109 E288 E83 E88 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA83 RA88 RA90 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1003; 04:06PM; 10922 N Topanga Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cYBR8U; Chatsworth; LAFD was summoned for an uninjured 10-year-old female, who was stranded in a rocky climbing area. LAFD Air Operations has sent a rescuer down to make contact and secure her to be hoisted, and delivered to a nearby ground-level location.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 BC15 E296 E87 H1 HA1 RA96 RH214 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0940; 03:25PM; 3387 Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/314eR5M; Brentwood; LAFD Air Operations has located an injured cyclist in a remote area, who will require an airship hoist and air transport to an area hospital. A rescuer will be lowered to initiate patient care and secure the patient for transport (with non-life-threatening injury). Ground crews will continue to respond to the location to assist with recovering the bicycle. Nothing further.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 BP19 E19 E269 H6 HA6 RA23 RA84 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1450; 09:25PM; 740 E 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/32yRamN; Green Meadows; It took 34 firefighters 28 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames from an outside fire extending in, which damaged several residential structures. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM22 E11 E203 E215 E233 E264 E33 E5 E57 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA64 RA833 T15 T3 T33 T64 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1450; 08:57PM; 740 E 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/32yRamN; Green Meadows; Outside fire extending in to several structures. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM22 E11 E203 E215 E233 E264 E33 E5 E57 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA64 RA833 T15 T3 T33 T64 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1041; 03:55PM; 19601 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZQHYT; Pacific Palisades; One 69-year-old male was found in fair condition, requesting medical assistance, as well as assistance returning from his remote location. LAFD Air Operations safely hoisted the patient and transported to an area hospital. ; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC10 E109 E273 E90 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA93 RH114 T73; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Fire; INC#0235; 06:40AM; 12269 W Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2lLts; Pacoima; The first arriving 45 firefighters took 72 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames involving vehicles (including at least two RVs), vegetation, and one residential structure. Firefighters prevented damage to a nearby commercial building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 AR33 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E24 E260 E275 E289 E290 E298 E7 E77 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 PH1 RA889 RA89 RA898 RA98 T60 T75 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Fire; INC#0235; 05:28AM; 12269 W Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2lLts; Pacoima; PRELIM: Fire involving vehicles (including motorhomes?) that extended to involve propane tanks and vegetation, to involve a home and threaten a commercial building.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E24 E260 E275 E289 E290 E298 E7 E77 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA889 RA89 RA898 RA98 T60 T75 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck; INC#1344; 07:35PM; 2141 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3regeK0; Harvard Heights; PRELIM: 1 person (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased at scene after reportedly being struck by a vehicle. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic (Incident #3394).; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; E226 EM1 RA26 T26; CH4; 10; Brian Humphrey
